DestructuringDeclarationWithTooManyEntries:NetworkStatusBanner.kt$val (icon, text, backgroundColor, contentColor) = when (networkState) { is NetworkState.Disconnected -> { Tuple4( Icons.Default.CloudOff, "No internet connection", MaterialTheme.colorScheme.errorContainer, MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onErrorContainer ) } is NetworkState.Limited -> { Tuple4( Icons.Default.Warning, "Limited connectivity: ${networkState.reason}", MaterialTheme.colorScheme.extended.warning, MaterialTheme.colorScheme.extended.onWarning ) } is NetworkState.Connected -> { // Should not be visible when connected return } }
